description: González, Felipe -- Photographs; Peres, Shimon, 1923-2016 -- Photographs
label: Spanish Prime Minister Felipe Gonzales who arrived in Israel for a short visit and met with Israel Foreign Minister Shimon Peres, PM Yitzhak Rabin told that the European Union is likely to reject a joint appeal by Israel and surrounding Arab countries for the Middle East regional development bank.
